Package application

Class Management

java.lang.Object
application.Employee
application.Fulltime
application.Management
public class Management
extends Fulltime
The management class is a subclass of our fulltime class. This means employees that have managerial roles are also considered fulltime employees, thus have the same 26 pay periods. We define three types of managerial roles: manager, department head, and director. In this class their bi-weekly payments are calculated in a similar fashion, but they are different because the limit for their additional annual compensations are different.
Author:
Ceceliachollette-Dickson, Nidaansari

  • Constructor Details

    • Management

      public Management​(Profile eProfile, double thePay, double annSalary, java.lang.String theRole)
      The parameterized constructor that specifies what specific attributes a fulltime employee with a managerial role must have.
      Parameters:
      eProfile - is the profile consisting of employee's name, department and date of hire
      thePay - is what an employee is paid each period
      annSalary - is an employee's annual salary
      theRole - is an employee's managerial role

  • Method Details

    • getBonus

      public double getBonus()
      Getter method to obtain an employee's bonus this period.
      Returns:
      the double value of the employee's bonus

    • getTheBonus

      public java.lang.String getTheBonus()
      Getter method to obtain an employee's bonus in decimal format.
      Returns:
      the decimal format of the bonus with two decimal places and dollar value

    • getRole

      public java.lang.String getRole()
      Getter method to obtain an employee's integer representation of their managerial role.
      Returns:
      the integer value of manager (1), department head (2), or director (3)

    • setRole

      public void setRole​(java.lang.String theRole)
      Setter method to set the role for an employee entering the company.
      Parameters:
      theRole - is the integer value of the role that will be given to an employee of managerial status

      toString in class Fulltime
